content: 3ch to join 96tr note for a larger coaster continue to work increases as set working one more 1tr in between each 2tr increase then continue to the edging section below edging round 1 1ch does not count as double_crochet throughout 1dc in first st 3ch skip 2tr double_crochet in next st 4ch skip 2tr double_crochet in next st to last 5 sts 3ch skip 2tr double_crochet in next st 4ch skip 2tr slip_stitch in first double_crochet of round to join round 2 slip_stitch in chain space 1ch 1dc in same chain space 1ch 9tr in next chain space 1ch 1dc in next chain space to last chain space 9tr in last chain space 1ch slip_stitch in first double_crochet of round to join fasten_off and break yarn press flat with iron starch if desired thread 32 beads onto yarn rejoin yarn to coaster by working a slip_stitch in any double_crochet of edging round 2 beading round 3ch pb 3ch slip_stitch in 5th treble_crochet of 9tr shell 3ch pb 3ch slip_stitch in next double_crochet to end working last slip_stitch in first slip_stitch to join fasten_off press again gently if desired taking care to avoid the beads thank you for downloading this pattern questions suggestions or comments email me at jemima bicknell@gmail com or contact me on www ravelry com username opalrose for kals pattern announcements advice and chat about my designs please join my ravelry group here http //www ravelry com/groups/jemima-bicknell-designs ©2016 by jemima bicknell all rights reserved 2 of 2
